availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas J. Below (Union County, KY, merchant)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Dora Ann Gough Below in Union County, Kentucky, on March 11, 1851. Father of Lewis R. Below, Louisa Below, and Aaron S. Below. Merchant in Union County in 1860. Merchant in Union County in July 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 413.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Union County Marriages, Film 000562172, p. 3.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Union County Marriages, Film 000562185, p. 47.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Union County, KY, July 1863, p. 4.
